name: Can You Escape From The School Hostel?
name_original: Can You Escape From The School Hostel?
description:
Friends do you like taking up challenges in your life? Have you ever been in a mostly challenging situations ever before? If no and you like to be in one then here is your chance to be in the mostly challenging game in your life. All you need to do is solve puzzles.

Welcome to The School Hostel Escape - a cool escape game!

Do you think you have the skills with The School Hostel Escape - a cool escape game?

School Hostel Escape is another new point and click type Hostel Room Escape Game. In this escape game, You are locked in Hostel Room Try to escape from the School Hostel by finding items and by solving the puzzles. Use your best escape skills. Good luck and Have Fun.



Game features:

• Genuine story!
• Innovative puzzles!
• Stunning graphics!
• Realistic atmosphere!
• Tricky and challenging puzzles!
• Gorgeous graphics !
• No signup's required, just download and install!

Enjoy this fun adventure escape game!
